column5: I have a map published by Alex Wilson Coldstream showing Nakina and areas to the South of Rt 11. I contacted the publisher and was informed they no longer publish these maps. I want the map showing areas North of Nakina. New or used, makes no difference. E-mail if you can help, [email protected]. Thanks
Try calling Skinner's in Longlac. If they're available they probably have them.

Fishoil is correct. Skinners does have maps of all those areas. I purchased some from him last summer, and they are pretty good maps. They break up into multiple areas and you can purchase the maps that interest you. All the best, Greg Bolinski Agate Bay Lodgewww.agatebaylodge.com NPAA #944
THANKS for the replies. Does anyone have phone # for Skinner's?

Here you go: Skinners Acre Bait and Tackle 128 Kenogami Dr, Longlac, ON P0T 2A0 Canada (807) 876-2245 Tell him Greg from Agate Bay Lodge sent you! Greg Bolinski Agate Bay Lodgewww.agatebaylodge.com NPAA #944
